name: HARVEEEEEEST
description:
A short harvesting game done for the ScoreSpace Game Jam #4.

Instrructions

Select objects with left mouse button, deselect objects with right mouse button.

The goal of the game is to grow and harvest as many crops as possible. This is done in the following way:

  • Dig a hole with the shovel
  • Place a seed in the hole
  • Water the crop when needed
  • Fertilize the crop when needed
  • Finally harvest the crop

Harvesting crops that are in order (In the list at the top of the screen) gives more points, and if you let one of the orders run out, you lose.
